item.title: ‘Fairyland’ Gets October Release Date From Lionsgate and Willa (EXCLUSIVE)
item.description: Lionsgate and WILLA have partnered to co-release the Sofia Coppola-produced film “Fairyland,” which will debut in theaters on Oct. 10. The film is written, produced and directed by Andrew
